name: @grpc/proto-loader

0.1.0.name: @grpc/proto-loader
0.1.0.description: gRPC utility library for loading .proto files

scripts.format: clang-format -i -style="{Language: JavaScript, BasedOnStyle: Google, ColumnLimit: 80}" src/*.ts test/*.ts
